settings.title: Great coffee, doing good.
settings.text:
We're an independent company based in Shoreditch, London - not an evil offshore empire. We're proud to pay our taxes in the UK, and to have created employment for more than 150 people in London.

We make long-term decisions, putting sustainability and quality first, and we're owned by our regulars, who have supported our growth through three record breaking rounds of crowdfunding.

settings.subtitle_1: All of our coffee is certified organic by the Soil Association. That means that we don't use any genetically modified produce or harmful pesticides in our coffee.
settings.subtitle_2: We work with smallholders around the world - empowering them to grow their farms, invest in their community and continue to make us the best coffee in the world.
settings.subtitle_3: We’ve offset the carbon emissions of 100,000 orders and counting - protecting over 40,000 trees in the Jari Pará conservation project in the Amazon.
settings.subtitle_4: Our customers have rated our coffee, and our customer service, as Excellent on Trustpilot.

settings.title: A small change, a big difference.
settings.text: 29,000 plastic and aluminium pods go to landfilll every minute. When composted, Grind coffee pods break down in weeks - but even in landfill they'll break down hundreds of times faster than their plastic or aluminium cousins.
